landingContent.heroSubtitle: Generate professional, persuasive emails that achieve your communication goals and build relationships.
landingContent.formula: [PERSONALIZED HOOK] + [VALUE PROPOSITION] + [CLEAR ASK] + [EASY CTA] = Response-Worthy Email
tips: Personalize the first line - reference something specific to the recipient to show you did your research
Lead with value - explain what's in it for them before asking for anything
One clear ask - don't confuse recipients with multiple requests; pick your priority
Make responding easy - suggest specific times, yes/no questions, or simple next steps

examples.title: Cold Outreach
examples.content:
Subject: Quick question about [their recent post]

Hi [Name], I saw your post about [topic] - the point about [specific insight] really resonated. I help [target audience] with [outcome]. Would a 15-minute call next week make sense?

examples.title: Follow-Up
examples.content:
Subject: Following up

Hi [Name], wanted to bump this to the top of your inbox. I know you're busy - would a quick reply with 'not now' or 'let's talk' help me know where we stand?

examples.title: Partnership Proposal
examples.content:
Subject: Collaboration idea for [their project]

Hi [Name], I've been following [their work] and have an idea that could [benefit]. I'd love to share a 2-minute proposal. Would that be worth your time?

faq.question: How long should my email be?
faq.answer: Keep cold emails under 150 words. For relationship emails, focus on being as concise as the message allows.

faq.question: How do I write a good subject line?
faq.answer: Be specific, create curiosity, and avoid spam triggers. Personalization with the recipient's name or company helps.

faq.question: When should I follow up?
faq.answer: Wait 3-5 business days for first follow-up, then 5-7 days for subsequent ones. Most responses come after the second email.

faq.question: How do I personalize at scale?
faq.answer: Research one specific detail per recipient - recent post, company news, or mutual connection. One personal touch makes all the difference.
